verses.verse: And <WG2532> when <WG3753> they drew nigh <WG1448> <WG5656> unto <WG1519> Yerushalayim <WG2414>, and <WG2532> were come <WG2064> <WG5627> to <WG1519> Beit-Pagei <WG967>, unto <WG4314> the mount <WG3735> of Olives <WG1636>, then <WG5119> sent <WG649> <WG5656> Yeshuw`a <WG2424> two <WG1417> Talmidim <WG3101>,

Now <WG1161> in the morning <WG4405> as he returned <WG1877> <WG5723> into <WG1519> the city <WG4172>, he hungered <WG3983> <WG5656>.

And <WG2532> when the Talmidim <WG3101> saw <WG1492> <WG5631> it, they marvelled <WG2296> <WG5656>, saying <WG3004> <WG5723>, How <WG4459> soon <WG3916> is the fig tree <WG4808> withered away <WG3583> <WG5681>!

Yeshuw`a <WG2424> answered <WG611> <WG5679> and <WG1161> said <WG2036> <WG5627> unto them <WG846>, Verily <WG281> I say <WG3004> <WG5719> unto you <WG5213>, If <WG1437> ye have <WG2192> <WG5725> faith <WG4102>, and <WG2532> doubt <WG1252> <WG5686> not <WG3361>, ye shall <WG4160> not <WG3756> only <WG3440> do <WG4160> <WG5692> this <WG3440> which is done to the fig tree <WG4808>, but <WG235> also if <WG2579> ye shall say <WG2036> <WG5632> unto this <WG5129> mountain <WG3735>, Be thou removed <WG142> <WG5682>, and <WG2532> be thou cast <WG906> <WG5682> into <WG1519> the sea <WG2281>; it shall be done <WG1096> <WG5695>.

The immersion <WG908> of Yochanan <WG2491>, whence <WG4159> was it <WG2258> <WG5713>? from <WG1537> heaven <WG3772>, or <WG2228> of <WG1537> men <WG444>? But <WG1161> what <WG5101> think <WG1380> <WG5719> ye <WG5213>? A certain man <WG444> had <WG2192> <WG5707> two <WG1417> sons <WG5043>; and <WG2532> he came <WG4334> <WG5631> to the first <WG4413>, and said <WG2036> <WG5627>, Son <WG5043>, go <WG5217> <WG5720> work <WG2038> <WG5737> to day <WG4594> in <WG1722> my <WG3450> vineyard <WG290>.

Hear <WG191> <WG5657> another <WG243> parable <WG3850>: There was <WG2258> <WG5713> a certain <WG444> <WG5100> householder <WG3617>, which <WG3748> planted <WG5452> <WG5656> a vineyard <WG290>, and <WG2532> hedged <WG5418> it <WG846> round about <WG4060> <WG5656>, and <WG2532> digged <WG3736> <WG5656> a winepress <WG3025> in <WG1722> it <WG846>, and <WG2532> built <WG3618> <WG5656> a tower <WG4444>, and <WG2532> let <WG1554> it <WG846> out <WG1554> <WG5639> to husbandmen <WG1092>, and <WG2532> went into a far country <WG589> <WG5656>:

And <WG1161> when <WG3753> the time <WG2540> of the fruit <WG2590> drew near <WG1448> <WG5656>, he sent <WG649> <WG5656> his <WG846> servants <WG1401> to <WG4314> the husbandmen <WG1092>, that they might receive <WG2983> <WG5629> the fruits <WG2590> of it <WG846>.

Again <WG3825>, he sent <WG649> <WG5656> other <WG243> servants <WG1401> more <WG4119> than the first <WG4413>: and <WG2532> they did <WG4160> <WG5656> unto them <WG846> likewise <WG5615>.

And <WG2532> they caught <WG2983> <WG5631> him <WG846>, and cast <WG1544> <WG5627> him out of <WG1854> the vineyard <WG290>, and <WG2532> slew <WG615> <WG5656> him.

Yeshuw`a <WG2424> saith <WG3004> <WG5719> unto them <WG846>, Did ye <WG314> never <WG3763> read <WG314> <WG5627> in <WG1722> the scriptures <WG1124>, The stone <WG3037> which <WG3739> the builders <WG3618> <WG5723> rejected <WG593> <WG5656>, the same <WG3778> is become <WG1096> <WG5675> <WG1519> the head <WG2776> of the corner <WG1137>: this <WG3778> is <WG3844> the YY's <WG2962> doing <WG1096> <WG5633>, and <WG2532> it is <WG2076> <WG5748> marvellous <WG2298> in <WG1722> our <WG2257> eyes <WG3788>?

Therefore <WG1223> <WG5124> say I <WG3004> <WG5719> unto you <WG5213>, <WG3754> The kingdom <WG932> of 'Elohim <WG2316> shall be taken <WG142> <WG5701> from <WG575> you <WG5216>, and <WG2532> given <WG1325> <WG5701> to a nation <WG1484> bringing forth <WG4160> <WG5723> the fruits <WG2590> thereof <WG846>.

And <WG2532> when the chief Kohanim <WG749> and <WG2532> P'rushim <WG5330> had heard <WG191> <WG5660> his <WG846> parables <WG3850>, they perceived <WG1097> <WG5627> that <WG3754> he spake <WG3004> <WG5719> of <WG4012> them <WG846>.

But <WG2532> when they sought <WG2212> <WG5723> to lay hands <WG2902> <WG5658> on him <WG846>, they feared <WG5399> <WG5675> the multitude <WG3793>, because <WG1894> they took <WG2192> <WG5707> him <WG846> for <WG5613> a prophet <WG4396>.
